opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States

opinion:
2 U.S. 396 (____)
2 Dall. 396

HOLLINGSWORTH
versus
ADAMS.

Supreme Court of United States.

Thomas and Hallowell, on behalf of the plaintiff, wished for time to enquire into the practice; but not being able on the next day to assign any satisfactory reason in maintenance of the action.

THE COURT directed the writ to be quashed with costs.
